transArray.content: The environment is very good, the service is serious, and the breakfast buffet is rich. If your room is stuck, you can repair it. There is a free coffee machine in the lobby, a laundry room where you can wash clothes and a dryer. In addition, if it rains, you can borrow an umbrella from the front desk. It is also close to the subway station and is very cost-effective.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. On a happy note, I want you to write your mood in notes. The hotel provides a variety of rich breakfast services to guests in the hotel from 7 to 10 a.m. every day. It is our greatest wish to make your mother feel comfortable during her stay. We look forward to it, friends. See you next time at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I wish you and your family a happy National Day holiday! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
